a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Cumulative CO₂ emissions by world region
Cumulative carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions by region from the year 1750 onwards. This measures CO₂

emissions from
fossil fuels and industry
only – land-use change is not included.

g.text: North America (excl. USA) North America (excl. USA)
Asia (excl. China and India) Asia (excl. China and India)
